title: the polit economi of postsoviet russia
content: thi book deal with gener polit and econom develop that took place in russia sinc the collaps of the soviet union the major aim of the book is to analys success and failur of russian reform attempt as well as their effect on the develop of russian region particularli from the point of view of interrel between socioeconom tendenc and polit develop analysi concentr on both nation dynam and dynam of develop in three main group of region mine agricultur and manufactur
